row-1.content: JavaScript and React: Concepts Road Map

id-1707324902682.content:
• Syntax and Basics: Learn variables, data types, operators, control flow ( if statements, loops), and error
  error handling.

id-1707324977769.content: • Functions: Understand function declarations, expressions, arrow functions, and higher-order functions.

id-1707325018809.content: • Objects and Arrays: Dive deep into working with objects, arrays, and methods for manipulation them.

id-1707325149145.content: • ES6 and Beyond: Explore ES6 features like let/const, template literals, destructuring, spread/rest operators, and ES
